offers.title: Logitech M330 Silent Plus Wireless Large Mouse Black
Logitech M330 SILENT PLUS Mouse - 2.4 GHz - Black

reviews.text_content: Super quiet and great value. Really responsive and good tactile sensation in your hand. Installs instantly on Windows 10 and works great. The best feature is it's silent. Best mouse to use at night or when others are trying to sleep nearby. It's so quiet it takes a moment to get used to. You keep thiking 'did I click'? lol - seriously great mouse and great value.

Cheaply Made, Overpromises Underdelivers. I will say that clicking on this mouse is quite and has a good tactile feel. That is where the positives end.The mouse itself is made out of horribly cheap feeling plastic and has almost no weight behind it. The AAA battery it takes is constantly falling out of its insert area causing me to open the battery door and reinsert it multiple times a use. The scroll wheel is different from other Logitech mice (I have used the M705 for years and love it) and this leads to a ton of noise when scrolling because the cheap wheel is rattling around while in use. The final issue I’ve found is the “on/off” switch on the bottom. On my m705 it is easy to toggle and functions perfectly, on the M330 the switch is again cheap plastic that is very difficult to toggle and feels as if it will be brokenwithin the next week or two.The mouse tracked well over different surfaces and the clicking was quiet and great but to me that is not enough to warrant the purchase with how many other issues need to be resolved, especially for the price range this mouse is at.

Good feel, a little small for my taste.. I really have enjoyed this mouse the last few weeks as a female in college. It's quiet and easy to use. I only wish it was a little bit bigger for my medium sized hands. Overall good value. Also, only takes one battery!

A good quality mouse for the price. I am using the M330 mouse on a non gaming computer running Windows 10. The mouse installed very easily it is ergonomically comfortable and it responds acceptably. The key feature is the near silent buttons which they indeed are.

SILENT MICE, VERY NICE. This mouse is so quiet I can barely hear it click even with no background noise. It moves very well and fits well in your hand. The silence did take some getting used to, but it's exactly what I was looking for! Very well made, sturdy and easy to install.

We love these M330 and 325 series Logitech Mice.. We have two M325 and one M330 Silent Logitech Mice and all work great, more precise than their cheaper mice. There is no sound at all from the M330 version. It's also a far better ergonomic fit for medium to large handed people than Logitech's smaller mice.

Best mouse ever! (15 years experience in computer repair/troubleshooting). You will not be disappointed! Great battery life and VERY quiet buttons. I've bought three... so far! Wouldn't hesitate to buy these for as long as I can get my hands on them.UPDATE (Two years later): Still using original batteries on all three of the mice! Logitech nailed it on this mouse!!! Buy buy buy!

Silence is golden. I have had other Logitech wireless mouse designs and this one I like more easier to to hold and control as I have hand tremors at times and the contour helps me keep ahold of the mouse and the silence for, the clicking is a plus. no more annoying constant clicks to make someone around me crazy with the clicking

What a Value!! Great quality @ Great price. The mouse I had came as a combo keyboard/mouse. It was probably the lowest-end combo Logitech makes ($16) . The mouse failed so I bought this and I love it. I should have bought another combo since I'm now taking up two separate USB.
Silent as can be!. This mouse is not only silent and comfortable to use, it also is energy efficient. It takes only one battery and lasts for months before i need to replace it. Great buy!

It is nice. The mouse itself is a charm, low noise which I am sensitive to. From my experience, I think the battery would last over 8 months.Thanks for providing this at lower price.Exactly as anticipated!
Works very good.. I bought it because it has almost the same dimensions by 1/8" as m705 and it feels smaller; yu can feel the difference in size. Overall is good.
does the job beautifully.. It does what I want a mouse to do, and very, very reliably. Not much else to say about it... Logitech rules that world, and this is a great example of why...
Great mouse. Excellent mouse. Very quiet and comfortable. Extremely easy to setup just plug n play.
Smooth mouse that fits the right hand perfectly!. Smooth, easy to connect, and durable !! Did I mention that it is a perfect fit on my right hand?
Good silent mouse. Good silent mouse. Good price. Comfortable. The only drawback is sometimes when it is turned off you need to move the on/off switch more than once to get it to turn on.
The best recent purchase made. Highly recommend it. Amazing mouse. It does not do loud clicking. Very comfortable. Design is superb. Would buy again. And would recommend it to everyone.
Worth the money. Generally love it. Only setback is the loose lead that makes some noise when you lift the mouse.

offers.title: M330 Wireless Silent Plus Mouse Ergonomic Logitech Mouse 10M 2.4GHz for PC Mac
Logitech M330 SILENT PLUS Wireless Mouse, 2.4GHz with USB Nano Receiver, 1000

reviews.text_content: Recommend quiet, smooth action mouse. Great mouse. Seems well built and sturdy, obviously quiet and a joy to use. Not as larger as my previous mouse, so it doesn’t fill my cupped hand. However I knew that before I purchased as the details showed the sizes. I still find it comfortable though (I use it 8 hours a day), and it’s more portable. I would definitely recommend.

Problems initially.. I had a lot of trouble initally setting the mouse up, the mouse pointer wouldn'tdisplay on my computer screen and after contacting Logitech for some unknown reson it miraculsly started working and I don't why.I had exactly the same mouse previously and never had any trouble and this was a replacement for that one.

Great little mouse, more comfortable than expected.. I'm very happy with my Logitech M330. It's small, portable & very quiet. One of my worries was that it wouldn't be that comfortable due to it's small size and my large hands, but it's surprisingly comfortable. Of course, there are plenty of more ergonomic mouses out there, but at this size and price, it'll be hard to beat this.

It's Kinda Small!. Nice buttons, but I think the mouse is quite small, maybe I'm used to a slightly larger mouse and so that's why it feels small. Nice quiet touch buttons and the scroll wheel has a nice notchy feeling to it which I like, if it was slightly larger it would be 5 stars :)

Quiet, comfortable and easy to use mouse. I have purchased this mouse to replace my previous logitech mouse.It has a great ergonomically designed feel to it. Mine is gor a right handed person and fits really nice in the hand, probably not so comfortable if you were left handed.
Right handed mouse. Clearly for use with the right hand which was not mentioned in the description. Useless to me, so a spare for someone else who will need it some day.
Feels good but works badly. Doesn't work well... Loses the ability to be a mouse intermittently. Irritating and as a result of no use.
light works in any position. great mouse works anywhere any surface quiet comfortable for long periods
Good value for money mouse. Nice design and very quiet.
Good product. Superb compared to my old mouse. Very smooth.

reviews.text_content: Super quiet and great value. Really responsive and good tactile sensation in your hand. Installs instantly on Windows 10 and works great. The best feature is it's silent. Best mouse to use at night or when others are trying to sleep nearby. It's so quiet it takes a moment to get used to. You keep thiking 'did I click'? lol - seriously great mouse and great value.

Cheaply Made, Overpromises Underdelivers. I will say that clicking on this mouse is quite and has a good tactile feel. That is where the positives end.The mouse itself is made out of horribly cheap feeling plastic and has almost no weight behind it. The AAA battery it takes is constantly falling out of its insert area causing me to open the battery door and reinsert it multiple times a use. The scroll wheel is different from other Logitech mice (I have used the M705 for years and love it) and this leads to a ton of noise when scrolling because the cheap wheel is rattling around while in use. The final issue I’ve found is the “on/off” switch on the bottom. On my m705 it is easy to toggle and functions perfectly, on the M330 the switch is again cheap plastic that is very difficult to toggle and feels as if it will be brokenwithin the next week or two.The mouse tracked well over different surfaces and the clicking was quiet and great but to me that is not enough to warrant the purchase with how many other issues need to be resolved, especially for the price range this mouse is at.

Good feel, a little small for my taste.. I really have enjoyed this mouse the last few weeks as a female in college. It's quiet and easy to use. I only wish it was a little bit bigger for my medium sized hands. Overall good value. Also, only takes one battery!

A good quality mouse for the price. I am using the M330 mouse on a non gaming computer running Windows 10. The mouse installed very easily it is ergonomically comfortable and it responds acceptably. The key feature is the near silent buttons which they indeed are.

SILENT MICE, VERY NICE. This mouse is so quiet I can barely hear it click even with no background noise. It moves very well and fits well in your hand. The silence did take some getting used to, but it's exactly what I was looking for! Very well made, sturdy and easy to install.

We love these M330 and 325 series Logitech Mice.. We have two M325 and one M330 Silent Logitech Mice and all work great, more precise than their cheaper mice. There is no sound at all from the M330 version. It's also a far better ergonomic fit for medium to large handed people than Logitech's smaller mice.

Best mouse ever! (15 years experience in computer repair/troubleshooting). You will not be disappointed! Great battery life and VERY quiet buttons. I've bought three... so far! Wouldn't hesitate to buy these for as long as I can get my hands on them.UPDATE (Two years later): Still using original batteries on all three of the mice! Logitech nailed it on this mouse!!! Buy buy buy!

Silence is golden. I have had other Logitech wireless mouse designs and this one I like more easier to to hold and control as I have hand tremors at times and the contour helps me keep ahold of the mouse and the silence for, the clicking is a plus. no more annoying constant clicks to make someone around me crazy with the clicking

What a Value!! Great quality @ Great price. The mouse I had came as a combo keyboard/mouse. It was probably the lowest-end combo Logitech makes ($16) . The mouse failed so I bought this and I love it. I should have bought another combo since I'm now taking up two separate USB.
Silent as can be!. This mouse is not only silent and comfortable to use, it also is energy efficient. It takes only one battery and lasts for months before i need to replace it. Great buy!
Great product, good price. Instant response, led light turn off when not in use perhaps saving battery?

Large mouse if you have small hands. Although I found this mouse to be smaller than I expected to be labeled a "large" mouse (I have big hands) it is still relatively comfortable even if it doesn't fit my hand the way I had expected. I would still rather have a larger mouse though.
Logitech Mouse. Have used for awhile now. Is responsive, moves easily. Haven't had to replace the battery yet. One factor in making the decision to bvuy.

Quiet as a real mouse!. I spend a lot of time on my computer. Most of it is spent at night. My husband was threatening to toss me and my computer out the door if he had to hear anymore click, click, clicking of my mouse. This mouse save my marriage and my computer!
